org.mixare.localMarker

Class LocalMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.localMarker.LocalMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Marker>, Marker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageMarker, NavigationMarker, POIMarker, SocialMarker

    public abstract class LocalMarker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Marker
    The class represents a marker and contains its information. It draws the marker itself and the corresponding label. All markers are specific markers like SocialMarkers or NavigationMarkers, since this class is abstract

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      MixVector cMarker
      Current Marker view position
      Label txtLab
      Title Label, can be override to set final touches on setting the title TODO txtLabel localize scope

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalMarker

        public LocalMarker(java.lang.String id,
           java.lang.String title,
           double latitude,
           double longitude,
           double altitude,
           java.lang.String link,
           int type,
           int colour)
        LocalMarker - Constructor Sub-Classes need to call this constructor
        Parameters:
        id - String marker's id (will be reset to id+type+title) use for reference
        title - String marker's title
        latitude - double marker's latitude
        longitude - double marker's longitude
        altitude - double marker's altitude (optional)
        link - String link page when marker clicked
        type - int data source type
        colour - int Color representation Color

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Location curGPSFix)
        Updates marker's based on the current location
        Specified by:
        update in interface Marker

      • calcPaint

        public final void calcPaint(Camera viewCam,
             float addX,
             float addY)
        A must call function to rotate marker to the current position, which provide the smooth aumented view. LocalMarkers sub-classes: Don't need to call this method, this method is being called by view before calling draw(PaintScreen) If the caller activity froze the view, this function will not be called. Overriding this method is not allowed
        Specified by:
        calcPaint in interface Marker

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(PaintScreen dw)
        Local marker specific drawing instruction. LocalMarkers Sub-classes Must call this to be drawn default implementation, for example, is drawing "object"/"circle" and text block
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Marker
        Parameters:
        dw - PaintScreen to be drawn into

        public boolean fClick(float x,
             float y,
             org.mixare.lib.MixContextInterface ctx,
             org.mixare.lib.MixStateInterface state)
        Handles Marker's click event. if Click was made within marker's boundaries, then click event is registered to current view state.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
